trans-unit.source: #12354 will redirect based on the query string as well as path if query_string stored. [djay]
trans-unit.target: #12354 will redirect based on the query string as well as path if query_string stored. [djay]

trans-unit.source: #12858 first suggestion on not found page can be unsuitable [anthonygerrard]
trans-unit.target: #12858 first suggestion on not found page can be unsuitable [anthonygerrard]

trans-unit.source: #9967 will append the same query string after redirecting to be more tracker friendly. [djay]
trans-unit.target: #9967 will append the same query string after redirecting to be more tracker friendly. [djay]

trans-unit.source: Add MANIFEST.in. [WouterVH]
trans-unit.target: Add MANIFEST.in. [WouterVH]

trans-unit.source: Add Python 2 / 3 compatibility [vincero]
trans-unit.target: Add Python 2 / 3 compatibility [vincero]

trans-unit.source: Add coding header on python files. [gforcada]
trans-unit.target: Add coding header on python files. [gforcada]

trans-unit.source: Added __iter__ function to storage which iterates over all paths. [fschulze]
trans-unit.target: Added __iter__ function to storage which iterates over all paths. [fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Added optional support for the getRedirectionAllowedForTypes method of Products.RedirectionTool. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Added optional support for the getRedirectionAllowedForTypes method of Products.RedirectionTool. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added quotation marks around open and close parens. This fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8588. [MatthewWilkes]
trans-unit.target: Added quotation marks around open and close parens. This fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8588. [MatthewWilkes]

trans-unit.source: Allow performance tests to take more time. This seems needed on the Plone Jenkins test server when jobs are run in parallel. [maurits] (#20)
trans-unit.target: Allow performance tests to take more time. This seems needed on the Plone Jenkins test server when jobs are run in parallel. [maurits] (#20)

trans-unit.source: Breaking changes:
trans-unit.target: 주요 변경 사항 :

trans-unit.source: Bring dead links back to life! plone.app.redirector knows where your content used to be and can bring you to its new location when content moves.
trans-unit.target: Bring dead links back to life! plone.app.redirector knows where your content used to be and can bring you to its new location when content moves.

trans-unit.source: Bug fixes:
trans-unit.target: 버그 수정:

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: 변경 로그

trans-unit.source: Cleanup project level files (setup.py, pyproject.toml) [maurits] [gforcada] (#2524)
trans-unit.target: Cleanup project level files (setup.py, pyproject.toml) [maurits] [gforcada] (#2524)

trans-unit.source: Don’t break in the objectMoved handler if the request has no ACTUAL_URL, to facilitate testing. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Don’t break in the objectMoved handler if the request has no ACTUAL_URL, to facilitate testing. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Don’t test repr of tree iterator. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Don’t test repr of tree iterator. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fix bad calling convention in IFourOhFourView definition. [wichert]
trans-unit.target: Fix bad calling convention in IFourOhFourView definition. [wichert]

trans-unit.source: Fix for the fix regarding unnecessary creation of redirection entries for newly created objects. [witsch]
trans-unit.target: Fix for the fix regarding unnecessary creation of redirection entries for newly created objects. [witsch]

trans-unit.source: Fix release confusion by ensuring we have a “late” version number. Somewhere, someone created a 1.0.7. :-) [optilude]
trans-unit.target: Fix release confusion by ensuring we have a “late” version number. Somewhere, someone created a 1.0.7. :-) [optilude]

trans-unit.source: Fix unnecessary creation of redirection entries for newly created objects. [witsch]
trans-unit.target: Fix unnecessary creation of redirection entries for newly created objects. [witsch]

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug which caused URLs with %-escaped sequences to grow extra %25s upon redirect. [erikrose]
trans-unit.target: Fixed a bug which caused URLs with %-escaped sequences to grow extra %25s upon redirect. [erikrose]

trans-unit.source: Fixed a test to be less dependent on the page rendering. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Fixed a test to be less dependent on the page rendering. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Fixed multiple steps circular references #8840 [gotcha]
trans-unit.target: Fixed multiple steps circular references #8840 [gotcha]

trans-unit.source: Fixed tests to be independent of any default content. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Fixed tests to be independent of any default content. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Fixed tests to use registry for value lookup. [esteele]
trans-unit.target: Fixed tests to use registry for value lookup. [esteele]

trans-unit.source: Fixes:
trans-unit.target: 수정 사항 :

trans-unit.source: Gracefully handle errors parsing the SearchableText query on the 404 view. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Gracefully handle errors parsing the SearchableText query on the 404 view. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Import object events from zope.lifecycleevent. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Import object events from zope.lifecycleevent. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Initial release. [optilude]
trans-unit.target: Initial release. [optilude]

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 소개

trans-unit.source: Keep track if a redirect was added manually or automatically. [maurits] (#18)
trans-unit.target: Keep track if a redirect was added manually or automatically. [maurits] (#18)

trans-unit.source: Minor packaging updates. (#1)
trans-unit.target: 사소한 패키징 업데이트. (#1)

trans-unit.source: Move event subscribers to a separate zcml file so they can easily be excluded. [wichert]
trans-unit.target: Move event subscribers to a separate zcml file so they can easily be excluded. [wichert]

trans-unit.source: Move tests from PloneTestCase to plone.app.testing. [timo]
trans-unit.target: Move tests from PloneTestCase to plone.app.testing. [timo]

trans-unit.source: New features:
trans-unit.target: 새로운 기능 :

trans-unit.source: No longer try to check portal_redirection for allowed types. This was from Products.RedirectionTool, which is scheduled to be merged into CMFPlone 5.2. The feature to allow redirections only for specific types will be either removed or changed. [maurits] (#1486)
trans-unit.target: No longer try to check portal_redirection for allowed types. This was from Products.RedirectionTool, which is scheduled to be merged into CMFPlone 5.2. The feature to allow redirections only for specific types will be either removed or changed. [maurits] (#1486)

trans-unit.source: Rename without using folder_contents. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Rename without using folder_contents. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Rerelease of 1.2.1 as 1.3 for clarity. This is for Plone 5 only. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: Rerelease of 1.2.1 as 1.3 for clarity. This is for Plone 5 only. [maurits]

trans-unit.source: Rerelease of same code as 1.2. The changes from 1.2.1 are for Plone 5. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: Rerelease of same code as 1.2. The changes from 1.2.1 are for Plone 5. [maurits]

trans-unit.source: Start searches for missing items in the navigation root instead of the site root. [wichert]
trans-unit.target: Start searches for missing items in the navigation root instead of the site root. [wichert]

trans-unit.source: Store date information in the paths. Can be used as basis for removing for example all redirects that are older than a year. [maurits] (#17)
trans-unit.target: Store date information in the paths. Can be used as basis for removing for example all redirects that are older than a year. [maurits] (#17)

trans-unit.source: Support parts of views e.g. mypage/@@myview/somepart [anthonygerrard]
trans-unit.target: Support parts of views e.g. mypage/@@myview/somepart [anthonygerrard]

trans-unit.source: Support redirecting to external URLs. [rpatterson]
trans-unit.target: Support redirecting to external URLs. [rpatterson]

trans-unit.source: Support using the ‘in’ operator for paths. Support using storage[old_path] to get the new path, possibly raising KeyError. Support using storage[old_path] to set or delete new paths. Support using len(storage) to get the number of paths. Support storage.clear() to clear out all data. Support storage.update() for bulk updates. Added performance tests. Call with
trans-unit.target: Support using the ‘in’ operator for paths. Support using storage[old_path] to get the new path, possibly raising KeyError. Support using storage[old_path] to set or delete new paths. Support using len(storage) to get the number of paths. Support storage.clear() to clear out all data. Support storage.update() for bulk updates. Added performance tests. Call with

trans-unit.source: The http status of the response is changed from 301 (Moved Permanently) to 302 (Found) for GET requests and to 307 (Temporary Redirect) for other request methods because nothing prevents the URL to be reused in the future. [ale-rt] (#8)
trans-unit.target: The http status of the response is changed from 301 (Moved Permanently) to 302 (Found) for GET requests and to 307 (Temporary Redirect) for other request methods because nothing prevents the URL to be reused in the future. [ale-rt] (#8)

trans-unit.source: The view in browser.py contains methods (used in Plone’s default_error_message.pt when it gets a NotFound error) that do the following:
trans-unit.target: The view in browser.py contains methods (used in Plone’s default_error_message.pt when it gets a NotFound error) that do the following:

trans-unit.source: This component expects you to register storage.RedirectionStorage as a local utility providing IRedirectionStorage (CMFPlone does this). Once that’s done, the subscribers in subscribers.py will listen for object moved and object deleted events.
trans-unit.target: This component expects you to register storage.RedirectionStorage as a local utility providing IRedirectionStorage (CMFPlone does this). Once that’s done, the subscribers in subscribers.py will listen for object moved and object deleted events.

trans-unit.source: Turned doctests into unittests. Removed no longer needed test_suite functions. [maurits] (#12)
trans-unit.target: Turned doctests into unittests. Removed no longer needed test_suite functions. [maurits] (#12)

trans-unit.source: Update browser view to handle environments where the storage utility is not availbale. [wichert]
trans-unit.target: Update browser view to handle environments where the storage utility is not availbale. [wichert]

trans-unit.source: Update license to GPL version 2 only. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Update license to GPL version 2 only. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Use p.a.contenttypes test fixture and adapt/fix failing tests due to the ATContentTypes removal from PLONE_FIXTURE in Plone 5. [timo]
trans-unit.target: Use p.a.contenttypes test fixture and adapt/fix failing tests due to the ATContentTypes removal from PLONE_FIXTURE in Plone 5. [timo]

trans-unit.source: Use zope.interface decorator. [gforcada]
trans-unit.target: zope.interface 데코레이터를 사용하십시오. [gforcada]

trans-unit.source: When an object is deleted, all references to it are deleted as well.
trans-unit.target: When an object is deleted, all references to it are deleted as well.

trans-unit.source: When an object is moved (renamed or cut/pasted into a different location), the redirection storage will remember the old path. It is smart enough to deal with transitive references (if we have a -> b and then add b -> c, it is replaced by a reference a -> c) and circular references (attempting to add a -> a does nothing).
trans-unit.target: When an object is moved (renamed or cut/pasted into a different location), the redirection storage will remember the old path. It is smart enough to deal with transitive references (if we have a -> b and then add b -> c, it is replaced by a reference a -> c) and circular references (attempting to add a -> a does nothing).

trans-unit.source: also ignore ids from views. [ldr]
trans-unit.target: also ignore ids from views. [ldr]

trans-unit.source: attempt to redirect from the assumed intended path to the new path of an object, if the redirection storage holds a reference from the old path.
trans-unit.target: attempt to redirect from the assumed intended path to the new path of an object, if the redirection storage holds a reference from the old path.

trans-unit.source: by Martin Aspeli <optilude@gmx.net> based on work by Helge Tesdal (RedirectionTool) and Whit Morriss (topp.rose).
trans-unit.target: by Martin Aspeli <optilude@gmx.net> based on work by Helge Tesdal (RedirectionTool) and Whit Morriss (topp.rose).

trans-unit.source: export PLONE_APP_REDIRECTOR_PERFORMANCE_NUMBER=100000
trans-unit.target: export PLONE_APP_REDIRECTOR_PERFORMANCE_NUMBER=100000

trans-unit.source: further, use the last id of the assumed intended path and attempt to search for objects in the catalog that contain this, presenting the options to the user
trans-unit.target: further, use the last id of the assumed intended path and attempt to search for objects in the catalog that contain this, presenting the options to the user

trans-unit.source: if not, look for the first valid parent of the assumed intended path, and present it as an option to the user
trans-unit.target: if not, look for the first valid parent of the assumed intended path, and present it as an option to the user

trans-unit.target: redirection tool
